QuestData.Title: Very Disarming
QuestData.Description: Look around you, $c. What do you see? I see an opportunity.$b$bThe casters here work to imbue the Zandalari weapons with powerful magic. As if a sharp blade isn't enough to cut even the strongest foe down to size.$b$bIn my scouting I've noticed the weapons are not very well guarded. This is where you come in...$b$bIf we can steal a few of these weapons we may be able to use them. At the very least they are out of enemy hands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Steal 7 Loa-Infused Blades from Conqueror's Terrace.
